wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Francis Colborne KCB (23 April 1817 – 26 November 1895) was Commander of British Troops in China, Hong Kong and the Straits Settlements.

link_mentions.page: Queen's Own Royal West Kent Regiment
response: *1881–1885: (1st Battalion) Gen. Hon. Sir Francis Colborne, KCB
*1885–1895: Gen. Hon. Sir Francis Colborne KCB
Another member of the Colborne family to gain distinction was the Hon. Sir Francis Colborne (1817–1895), second son of the first Baron. He was a General in the Army.
* Francis Colborne (1817–1895), Commander of British Troops in China, Hong Kong and the Straits Settlements
